column2: ENGLISH
Ambitious characters of noble descent can go off and attempt to seize duchies in foreign lands with a band of adventurers.
column3: D'ambitieux personnages d'origine noble peuvent partir vers des terres étrangères accompagnés d'une bande d'aventuriers dans le but de conquérir des duchés.
column4: Ambitionierte Charaktere von nobler Abstammung können versuchen, Grafschaften in fremden Ländern mit einer Gruppe von Abenteurern einzunehmen.
column6: Personajes ambiciosos de ascendencia noble pueden salir y tratar de apoderarse de ducados en tierras extranjeras con una banda de aventureros.

column2: From the steppes of Central Asia
Following [emf_seljuk.GetHerHis] decorated service as a mercenary in the [emf_seljuk_merc_commander_title.GetFullName]
Following [emf_seljuk.GetHerHis] veteran service as the [emf_seljuk_mercenary_title.GetRulerTitle] of the [emf_seljuk_mercenary_title.GetFullName]
A former general for [emf_seljuk_former_liege.GetTitledName]
From the untamed lands of the Northern Caucasus
The Great Seljuk
[emf_seljuk.GetFirstName] [emf_seljuk.GetOnlyDynastyName]

[emf_seljuk.EMFSeljuk_GetIntroPhrase], a great warrior has emerged as the leader of the Kinik tribe of the Oghuz Turks, demonstrating his brilliance by winning a war for the [emf_cb_title.GetFullBaseName] against the mighty [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Other tribes have taken notice and warriors of all stripes are flocking to his banners in great numbers. Seljuk Khan has promised them a fortune in plunder in his future conquests!
column3: Dans les steppes d'Asie centrale, un grand guerrier est apparu à la tête de la tribu des Kinik, une tribu de turcs oghouzes. Il a fait preuve de son talent en remportant une guerre contre [FromFrom.GetLeLa] puissant[FromFrom.GetNoneE] [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Voyant cela, d'autres tribus de guerriers se sont rassemblées en grand nombre sous sa bannière. Seljuk Khan leur a promis des pillages et la fortune lors de ses conquêtes !
column4: Aus den Steppen Zentralasiens kam ein großer Krieger als Führer des Kinikstammes der Oghuz-Türken und zeigte sein Können, als er den Krieg gegen den mächtigen [FromFrom.GetTitledName] gewann. Andere Stämme zeigten ihre Achtung und Krieger aller Farben sammeln sich unter seinem Banner. Seljuk Khan hat ihnen Reichtum und Plünderei in seinen zukünftigen Feldzügen versprochen!
column6: En las estepas de Asia central, un gran guerrero emergió como el líder de la tribu Kinik de los Turcos Oguz, demostrando su brillantez al ganar la guerra contra el poderoso [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. Otras tribus se han enterado y columnas enteras marchan a unirse a su bandera. ¡Seljuk Khan les ha prometido una fortuna en saqueos en sus futuras conquistas!

column2: [emf_seljuk.EMFSeljuk_GetIntroPhrase], the great warrior [emf_seljuk.GetFirstName] [emf_seljuk.GetOnlyDynastyName] demonstrated [emf_seljuk.GetHerHis] brilliance by winning a war for the [emf_cb_title.GetFullName] against the mighty [FromFrom.GetTitledName]. [emf_seljuk.GetSheHeCap] is a direct descendant of Seljuk, the legendary leader of the Kinik tribe of the Oghuz Turks. Other tribes have taken notice and warriors of all stripes are flocking to [emf_seljuk.GetHerHis] banners in great numbers. [emf_seljuk.GetFirstName] has promised them a fortune in plunder from [emf_seljuk.GetHerHis] future conquests!
This is only the beginning!
He is a credit to all Turks!
column3: Il fait honneur de tous les Turcs !
column4: Er gereicht den Türken zur Ehre!

column2: Turkic khans come and go...
column3: Les khans turcs, ils vont, ils viennent...
column6: Los Khan turcos vienen y van...

column2: As your people have settled into their new, sedentary lifestyle, they have started adopting traditions and customs that are different from those of your nomadic, Oghuz ancestors. Maybe it is time for us to take on this new heritage as well?
Yes, let us embrace this new culture!
No, I would rather stick to our old ways.

The lush Anatolian steppes and mountains are your new homeland now, and with them comes a lifestyle that is different in noticeable ways from that of your old, Türkmen past. Do you wish to make this new culture your own?
Seljuk Conquest Zone - Tier I
Seljuk Conquest Zone - Tier II
Seljuk Conquest Zone - Tier III
Seljuk Invader
This character is a §YSeljuk Invader§!. Only one such character may be alive at once.
